item.title: Tariffs may have cost US economy thousands of jobs monthly, Fed analysis reveals
item.description: A new Fed study estimates tariffs cost the U.S. economy 19,000 jobs per month in 2025, potentially raising unemployment by 0.1 percentage points.

item.title: Middle-income Americans struggling to keep up as living costs weigh on paychecks, survey says
